about.title: About ConvertViral
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to make file conversion fast, easy, and even fun.
about.story_p1: ConvertViral was born out of frustration with existing file conversion tools that were slow, complicated, and filled with limitations and ads.
about.story_p2: In 2023, our team of developers and designers came together with a simple goal: create the fastest, most user-friendly file conversion platform on the web, and make the experience enjoyable through gamification.
about.story_p3: Today, ConvertViral processes over 50,000 file conversions daily for users worldwide, with our community growing every day.
about.mission_subtitle: We're transforming file conversion from a tedious task into an engaging experience.
about.speed_desc: We believe file conversion should take seconds, not minutes. Our optimized conversion engine is built for maximum speed.
about.privacy_desc: Your files are yours alone. We use end-to-end encryption and automatically delete all files after 24 hours.
about.fun_desc: We've added points, badges, and leaderboards to make file conversion an enjoyable experience you'll want to come back to.
about.team_subtitle: A passionate group of developers, designers, and conversion specialists
about.team_member1_desc: Full-stack developer with a passion for creating intuitive user experiences.
about.team_member2_desc: UI/UX specialist focused on creating beautiful, functional interfaces.
about.team_member3_desc: Backend architect with expertise in building scalable conversion systems.
about.team_member4_desc: Growth specialist with a background in digital marketing and community building.
about.cta_subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied users who trust our platform for all their file conversion needs.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help with any questions or issues
contact.get_in_touch_desc: Have a question about our services? Need help with your account? Our support team is ready to assist you.
contact.faq_desc_3: for quick answers to common questions.
contact.form_subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.success_message: Thank you for contacting us. We've received your message and will respond within 24-48 hours.
contact.submit_error: There was an error submitting your message. Please try again.

errors.contact_support: Contact support if the problem persists

hero.title: Powerful Features for All Your Conversion Needs
hero.description: Discover the tools and features that make ConvertViral the most versatile file conversion platform available.

main_features.title: Core Features
main_features.description: Everything you need for seamless file conversion
main_features.feature_1_description: Convert multiple files simultaneously to save time
main_features.feature_2_description: Import files directly from Google Drive, Dropbox, and OneDrive
main_features.feature_3_description: Reduce file sizes without losing quality
main_features.feature_4_description: Save your conversion settings for future use
main_features.feature_5_description: Access your previously converted files anytime
main_features.feature_6_description: Preview files before and after conversion

file_formats.title: Supported File Formats
file_formats.description: We support over 200 file formats across multiple categories
file_formats.category_1_description: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, TXT, RTF, and more
file_formats.category_2_description: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP, TIFF, SVG, WebP, and more
file_formats.category_3_description: MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC, OGG, WMA, and more
file_formats.category_4_description: MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, MKV, WebM, and more
file_formats.category_5_description: ZIP, RAR, 7Z, TAR, GZ, and more
file_formats.category_6_description: EPUB, MOBI, AZW, FB2, and more

gamification.title: Gamified Conversion Experience
gamification.description: Make file conversion fun with points, badges, and challenges
gamification.feature_3: Unlock badges as you reach milestones
gamification.badge_example_description: Convert 100 files in a single day
